title: The Happy Prince Preview Screening
description:
The Happy Prince (15)

​Tuesday 29th May, 6.30pm

“It is a part he was born to play, and he does it with exactly the right kind of poignantly ruined magnificence” – The Guardian

“Rupert Everett brings power and empathy to Oscar Wilde’s gutter years” – The Telegraph

 “Everett’s performance marks a career-best and many will be drawn by it” – Screendaily

 

Rupert Everett directs and stars in the seldom-told story of the last days of exiled writer Oscar Wilde. Once the toast of London, Wilde is now a spent force. As he lies on his deathbed, the past comes flooding back to him, transporting him to other times and places.

 

To book your tickets: click here
